snippet: Byron Lima, a former army captain serving time in the killing of a Roman Catholic bishop, has been charged with money laundering and organized crime related to an illicit multimillion-dollar prison empire.
abstract: Byron Lima, former army captain in Guatemala serving time in 1998 killing of Roman Catholic Bishop Juan Gerardi Conedera, has been charged with money laundering and organized crime related to an illicit multimillion-dollar prison empire.
lead_paragraph: Byron Lima, a former army captain serving time in the killing of a Roman Catholic bishop, has been charged with money laundering and organized crime related to an illicit multimillion-dollar prison empire.
